messages.messageBody:

loves Baby Bug.

"I do not have to take a journey to find a shaman. I have a sage sitting on

messages.subject: RE: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Cool Magazines
messages.messageBody:
<<<< I am trying to come up with a list of magazines for kids. Our
Perpetual
Recess thing is going to subscribe to some magazine and I've got
unschooling ones covered and all ds cares about is either PS2 or Xbox
mag so I need some other titles that your kids seem to love.
Any suggestions? >>>>

Jayn (5.5) loves Disney Princess.

Robyn L. Coburn

messages.subject: RE: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Cool Magazines
messages.msgSnippet: Sad news about All Round- they have ceased publication.  We just got the last issue last week.  Sorry to see it go as it is one of our favorites. However, they
messages.messageBody:
Sad news about All Round- they have ceased publication. We just got the
last issue last week. Sorry to see it go as it is one of our favorites.
However, they are planning to publish some books done the same way as the
magazine. They might even have back issues available for sale. The website
doesn't reflect this change yet, but you can read about it and get contact
information there.

http://www.allroundmagazine.com/index.html

Kristin

-----Original Message-----
From: UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com
[mailto:UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com] On Behalf Of
kbcdlovejo@...

We get Kids Discover and ReLix (jam bands) and Modern Drummer and All
Round (by unschoolers).

~Kelly

messages.subject: rpg chat
messages.msgSnippet: ... I think -  spending hours and hours pretending to be characters from literature and having fascinating interactions with each other. Nobody s making them
messages.messageBody:
>>>>>>>>>>>>Now there are all these people - hundreds,
I think - spending hours
and hours pretending to be characters from literature
and having
fascinating interactions with each other. Nobody's
making them do it.
Roxana is regularly staying up until 3 am because
she's enjoying it SO
much that she just can't make herself stop and go to
bed.
>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>

yea! thousands probably! because of rpg chat, my son
had to install two dictionaries and a thesaurus next
to the computer! how's that for "vocabulary
building"?!
Anna
